description:
Ridgepoint TK - 8 School is a high-achieving school focusing on Multi-Tiered Systems of
Support (MTSS) for academics, family engagement, and socio-emotional learning. Our
active PTA provides a variety of activities such as a family picnic, school carnival, Santaâ€™s
Breakfast, and a Jog-A-Thon. The staff is highly qualified and is committed to academic
achievement. You are welcome to come by any time for a tour of the campus and to
meet our administrators.
